thread.title: Saudi connection: Medeama sign partnership agreement with Saudi top-flight side
thread.title_full: Saudi connection: Medeama sign partnership agreement with Saudi top-flight side

title: Saudi connection: Medeama sign partnership agreement with Saudi top-flight side
text:
14:25 CET Saudi connection: Medeama sign partnership agreement with Saudi top-flight side - www.allsports.com.gh 
Ghana premier league side, Medeama SC last Sunday officially signed a long term partnership agreement with Saudi top-flight side, Al Wadha. 
The deal which was brokered by Step by Step management will see the Ghanaian club exchange programmes with their new partners as the Gulf club will offer practical support, advice in youth coaching and player development. 
Al Wadha club led by their Chief Executive Officer, Morsi Hisham Morsi arrived in Ghana last week and was taken to Tarkwa by Medeama officials led by Moses Parker. The Saudi side have also pledged to build schools in the Dompin area. 
The agreement was signed by Medeama's owner Moses Parker, Al Wadha CEO Morsi Hisham Morsi and Hani CEO of Step by Step management and the witness to the signed deal was Lawyer Daniel Amoah at the Alisa Hotel in Accra. 
For more sports news visit allSports.com.gh Sports News Follow Us Success is not determined by material wealth but by the impact one makes on the lives of others. By: Godwin Yaw Agboka
